description: A young member of the http://anidb.net/ch1699 [Desert Dawn] resistance group who serves as http://anidb.net/ch304 [Cagalli`s] driver and sidekick. Ahmed has a poorly-disguised crush on the tomboyish http://anidb.net/ch304 [Cagalli], which drives this brave lad to take foolish risks in hopes of impressing her.
name: Ahmed El Fasi
